mapper.select: SELECT * FROM loan_application WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status IN (0, 1, 3) ORDER BY apply_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM repayment_schedule WHERE loan_id = #{loanId} AND status = 0 ORDER BY installment_no LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM repayment_schedule WHERE loan_id = #{loanId} AND installment_no = #{installmentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT la.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM repayment_schedule WHERE loan_id = #{loanId}) as remaining_installments, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM actual_repayment WHERE loan_id = #{loanId}) as paid_installments FROM loan_application la WHERE la.id = #{loanId}
SELECT rs.*, DATE_FORMAT(rs.due_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as due_date_formatted FROM repayment_schedule rs WHERE rs.loan_id = #{loanId} ORDER BY rs.installment_no

SELECT ar.*, DATE_FORMAT(ar.repayment_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as planned_date_formatted, DATE_FORMAT(ar.actual_repayment_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as actual_date_formatted FROM actual_repayment ar WHERE ar.loan_id = #{loanId} ORDER BY ar.installment_no

SELECT la.*, DATE_FORMAT(la.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as apply_date, DATE_FORMAT(la.approve_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as approve_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM repayment_schedule WHERE loan_id = #{loanId}) as remaining_installments, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM actual_repayment WHERE loan_id = #{loanId}) as paid_installments FROM loan_application la WHERE la.id = #{loanId}
